statement.p: If two resistors are arranged in parallel one is \displaystyle{7.0}\Omega and the other is \displaystyle{6.0}\Omega, what is the resulting resistance? \displaystyle\Omega

solution.p: The model is \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{R}_{{F}}}=\frac{{1}}{{R}_{{1}}}+\frac{{1}}{{R}_{{2}}}. In this case that is
